item.endless_sword.infinity_sb: The strongest blade in the universe
item.endless_sword.warp_sb: The strongest blade in the universe
tips.endless_sword.infinity_sb_info0: Liberate here, the strongest force in the universe
tips.endless_sword.infinity_sb_info1: The end of drawing swords has arrived
tips.endless_sword.infinity_sb_info2: Ah ah ah ah, seeing this knife, I see fear.
tips.endless_sword.infinity_sb_info3: The endless starry sea has been opened up! Oh my god, what is this!
tips.endless_sword.infinity_sb_info4: You can never imagine what you would become under the blade.
